title: Spa Profile: Anamaya Resort
author: Dswp Admin
cleaned_text: Overall wellness is at the heart of this stunning Costa Rica-based resort. Set on a cliffside overlooking dramatic ocean views, [Anamaya Resort](http://www.anamayaresort.com) in Montezuma, Costa Rica, presents a unique, health-focused experience for spa-goers. The concept of wellness is integral to Anamaya Resort, "anamaya" being the Sanskrit word for "good health." The resort offers an array of activities ranging from several types of yoga classes and training sessions, to exclusive fire dancing and circus entertainment experiences that aim to "enhance the exotic and unique experience of visiting Costa Rica." Spa services include massages focusing on relaxation, deep tissue and therapy using techniques such as hot stone massage, Thai massage and Reiki treatments. The resort offers various retreat packages designed to enhance overall wellness through yoga, meditation, art and mindful eating.
